Detailed Description

Class for providing a method to transfer paramters between a system and the framework.

u32  PropertyFlags,
pcstr  pszValue1Name,

pcstr  pszValue3Name,
pcstr  pszValue4Name,
  ... 
)

Constructor for creating a well formed property. Useful for creating an array of statically defined properties.

Parameters:
pszPropertyName The name of this property.
PropertyType The type of property from Proerties::Values.
PropertyFlags Flags for qualifying the use of the property.
Constructor for creating a well formed property. Useful for creating an array of statically defined properties. Gives the extra added bonus of naming the values within an xDF instead of just Value1, Value2, etc.

Parameters:
pszPropertyName The name of this property.
PropertyType The type of property from Proerties::Values.
PropertyFlags Flags for qualifying the use of the property.
pszValue1Name Name of value 1.
pszValue2Name Name of value 2.
pszValue3Name Name of value 3.
pszValue4Name Name of value 4.
